author: shresth
content: I think I know a way to elleviate the second case really stuck situation. I propose that a sync update can have multiple blocks. Instead of checking 2/3 participation on a single block of the whole sync committee period. I can check multiple blocks and if the aggregated unique signatures is  > 2/3 then I can accept on the next sync committee which should be common among these blocks. This can help me verify the next sync comittee period

content: Let me explain my protocol again. Lets assume I am a light client and I have a finalised slot n.
